cc-number.label: Card number

cc-number.v8n_unsupported: We don't support this card type

status-message.idle: Your card details are protected with SSL and a NSA-approved encryption algorithm.
status-message.stripe_idle: Your card details are securely processed by Stripe. Visit https://stripe.com to learn more.
status-message.square_idle: Your card details are securely processed by Square. Visit https://squareup.com to learn more.
status-message.fail_5xx: Card tokenization service is currently unavailable. Please try again later.
status-message.fail_4xx: This card doesn't appear to be valid. Please check the details and try again.

delete.delete_prompt: If you have any active subscriptions, they will fail on next payment date. Are you sure you'd like to remove this card?
